title: Quick app switching by swiping HOME button on Pixel 4a 5G is not supported
content:
I have a very VERY specific question about the Pixel 4a 5G.
I already got it and I love using it, but I have something that makes it hard to get used to, compared to my prior Pixel 3 XL.

Under the phone's Settings -> System -> Gestures -> System Navigation
There are two options... the new "Gesture Navigation", and the legacy "3-button Navigation".

I love, and always will, the "3-button Navigation".
But the Pixel 4a 5G lost a VERY crucial feature with that 3-button Navigation.
I can no longer swipe left and right to quickly switch back-and-forth between recent apps.
And that swiping feature is available in the "Gesture Navigation" option.
So, why does the 3-button Navigation not have it?

Is there something I can do?
If not, what can i do to request that feature inclusion?

PLEASE GIVE ME GOOD NEWS!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
